message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I propose a price of $1,800,000. What are your thoughts?

I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe it's a good starting point, considering its value to me is $1,000,000. What are your thoughts on this offer?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is truly exceptional and warrants a higher price.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,650,000. This reflects its true worth while acknowledging your initial offer.  What do you say?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $1,650,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,550,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $1,000,000. What do you think?
